name: Banana Cake
instructions: Beat butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in sour milk. Add to batter and beat well. Add bananas alternately with sifted dry ingredients. Mix just until blended. Pour into a prepared 9" square baking pan. Bake at 350 for 45 to 50 minutes. Ice with Banana Icing (p. 147) or Chocolate Icing.
